job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: <ul><li>Big Data, Hadoop on Data Warehousing or Data Integration projects.</li><li>Analysis, Design, development, support and Enhancements of ETL/ELT in data warehouse environment with Cloudera Bigdata Technologies</li><li>Writing Hadoop/Hive/Impala scripts for gathering stats on table post data loads.</li><li>Development experience creating Sqoop scripts, PySpark programs, HDFS commands, HDFS file formats, StreamSets pipeline creation, jobs scheduling, etc.</li><li>Strong SQL experience (Oracle and Hadoop (Hive/Impala etc.)).</li></ul>
